thread.title: Lou McClung: Meet the Lakewood man who owns Lusso Cosmetics, curates religious statues museum (photos)
thread.title_full: Lou McClung: Meet the Lakewood man who owns Lusso Cosmetics, curates religious statues museum (photos)

author: Allison Carey, The Plain Dealer
title: Lou McClung: Meet the Lakewood man who owns Lusso Cosmetics, curates religious statues museum (photos)
text: Lou McClung is Lakewood's own Renaissance man. He designs, demonstrates and produces Lusso Cosmetics from his makeup showroom and factory and he restores statues and runs the Museum of Divine Statues from the old school building and the church of the shuttered St. Hedwig parish in Lakewood's Birdtown.
